1.title: Becky/Nekka/Marissa
1.plot: For over 18 years, acclaimed spiritual medium Rebecca Rosen has been cultivating her incredible ability to communicate with spirits in an effort to bring closure to thousands of family members and friends who've lost people close to them.

2.title: Cara and Traci
2.plot: Cara lost her husband and five-year-old son in a car accident that her young daughter survived. When Traci's mom died of cancer, her estranged father unexpectedly re-entered her life.

3.title: Ian and Marda
3.plot: Ian, a young soldier, wonders if his late mother was the guardian angel that saved him from a rocket-propelled grenade that destroyed his vehicle while on duty in Afghanistan. Marda enlists Rebecca's help to release the spirit of her fighter pilot father who died during the Vietnam War months before she was born.

4.title: Laura and Mindy
4.plot: Big sister Laura felt she was doing the right thing when delivering some tough love to her brother about his problems with drugs. Mindy's dreams for the perfect destination wedding are shattered when two of her best friends and bridesmaids are killed in a car accident in route to the rehearsal dinner.

5.title: Jenn and Jacqueline
5.plot: Rebecca helps Jenn through the guilt and unanswered questions surrounding her brother's suicide. She hopes to find if she missed any signs that could have prevented the tragedy. Having lost him to a policeman's bullet before she was born, Jacqueline hopes that Rebecca can connect her with the father she never met.

6.title: Steve and Misty; Stacy
6.plot: Father of three Steve, arranged for his dying wife to spend time with everyone she touched in life, but in the chaos was never able to say his final goodbye. Distraught, Steve wants Rebecca's help to have his moment with the love of his life. Stacy's quest to meet her birth mother is thwarted when she discovers that her mother has died.

7.title: Lindsey and Deidre
7.plot: Lindsey is a young widow whose husband's sudden and recent death left her alone with three young children. Lindsey meets with Rebecca to seek her husband's guidance on how to help their children cope with his death. Deidre's last words to her father were said in anger. She needs Rebecca's help to relieve her guilt and regret and to mend the broken relationship.

8.title: Lisa and Rachel
8.plot: Lisa wrote a country song about the death of a 19 year-old boy in a car accident. A year later her son died in eerily similar circumstances. Lisa fears her words sealed her son's fate and seeks Rebecca's guidance to make sense of it. Rachel needs Rebecca's help in figuring out what her husband was trying to tell her in the last moments of his life.

9.title: Krista/Tony and Kristin
9.plot: Rebecca meets with siblings Krista and Tony, locked in a bitter feud over the sale of their family home. Kristin made the difficult decision to end treatment for her terminal young son. She hopes to reach out to him through Rebecca to make sure he understands her choice and forgives her.

10.title: Tracy and Dominic
10.plot: Tracy lost both her mother and brother in separate car accidents within an eight month span, and with Rebecca's help, communicates with them to find out why. Dominic meets with Rebecca in an attempt to let go of the anger he feels toward the friend who murdered his brother.

11.title: Livia
11.plot: Livia's family life was ripped apart when her brother brutally murdered their mother. Struggling with the idea of forgiveness, she contacts her mother with Rebecca's help to understand how she should feel towards her brother.

12.title: Todd/McKenna and Meana
12.plot: Todd and McKenna reach out through Rebecca to Mary, the wife and mother whose absence looms large. Rebecca meets with Meana, who lost her oldest son to a deadly asthma attack.

imdb.title: The Last Goodbye
plot: "_The Last Goodbye_ (qv)" is a new original series featuring spiritual medium, Rebecca Rosen, as she uses her unique gift in an attempt to connect people seeking answers from their deceased family and loved ones.
